title: serves up
extract: : to give (food) to someone at a meal, in a restaurant, etc. That little restaurant serves up some of the best Indian food in the city. —sometimes used figuratively The movie serves up a lot of laughs.
extract_html: : to give (food) to someone at a meal, in a restaurant, etc. That little restaurant serves up some of the best Indian food in the city. —sometimes used figuratively The movie serves up a lot of laughs.
